attributes.review: I downloaded this to support the president, but when I went in I saw this DISGUSTING🤮 and HIDEOUS 🤢 Cheeto looking creature!!😖😖  I tried to calm myself but it was so horrifying😰 I ended up having to go to therapy for the next 20 years and have still not recovered. I still have nightmares of if the racist, homophobic, rapist (and more awful things) Cheeto creature and will wake up screaming. PLEASE REMOVE THIS APP NOW!! 🤬🤬😡😤
attributes.title: This app is disgusting 😡😡

attributes.review: So first of all when I opened the app I saw a ugly orange blob , it made me throw my phone across the room then my cat saw it and it made her fart and it stunk really bad and not only that it gave me ptsd from when I was in 5th grade I had a really mean teacher and she looked like the orange blob 😷anyways I don’t recommend this app but I do recommend you give it a 1/5 rating 😊have a nice day 😌.
attributes.title: VeRY ScArY 😰

attributes.review: I opened the app for the first time to see a picture of a grossly distorted image of an orange bunker boy, it was horrifying. Then the app tried to get me to give away some of my personal information. I was completely and utterly appalled, please do not download this app you will be very disappointed and confused and quite honestly most likely scarred for life. It’s a no for me🙅‍♀️🙈😌😳🤚🏻🤢
attributes.title: Very disturbing

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I can not believe this app is allowed to be in the App Store. I opened the app and it immediately tried to get me to join a cult. I can not believe people even have this on their phone I might have to soak my phone in holy water. Information on this app is all FAKE NEWS! Very manipulative and one sided, who wants to be brain washed by a man who looks like annoying orange. Please BEWARE!!🤮🤮🤮🤮😡😡😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤮

attributes.review: What can I say besides this is an awful app for an awful person. How could anyone continue to support a misogynistic, racist, bigot that does not actual care about the people that blindly support him. He’s doesn’t care about you and will never care about you! #BLM. #ACAB. The world would be a much better place if this app and this man was removed from office.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: I downloaded this “APP” and Donald trump popped out of the screen and spit hot cheeto slobber on my face and kept taking about  his squirrel wig and fake tan🤮🤮he kept telling me I was horrible person and should go back to the country I came from after that they somehow got my number and kept harassing with text to buy his new wig the squirrel 2.0 I am never downloading this app again
attributes.title: HORRID, TERRIFYING

attributes.review: I opened the app and I was bombarded with terrible flashing images and offensive language!! 😳😳 I was at a loss! And completely shocked... aghast one might say. I am a very delicate and petite young voter, and this app literally made me feel sick 🥵🥵🥵 Please help me!! Plus, the functions and buttons all started swimming before my eyes. Chaotic interface and way too much for my taste. NEVET AGAIN
attributes.title: very ugly interface

attributes.review: This app was literally so bad I can hardly type up this review. Donald J. Trump really fumbled the bag with this one... Donloading this app made my wife leave me and got me fired from my job 😭 BUT something I did do to turn my life around after this app ruined it was STAN LOONA!! Staning Loona was the best decision I could’ve ever made! My wife is actually considering coming back to me bc if Loona.. anyway stan Loona, dont reelect Cheeto man and Xue Hua Piao Piao Bei Feng Xiao Xiao ✨💗🧚🏼‍♀️🌸
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE

attributes.review: this app is so OFFENSIVE and TRIGGERING 🗿. i believe apple should remove this app because it it a danger to the public. i downloaded this app so that i could see when the next rally i was going to reserve a seat at but ✨ not go to ✨ was. but as soon as i opened the app BOOM i saw this sex offender pop up on my screen🤮. i immediately started vomiting uncontrollably.
attributes.title: disgusting, terrible, should be deleted

attributes.review:
I got the app because somebody told me I was a snowflake ❄️ 😢 and I’m no snowflake 😤💪 so I wanted to prove them wrong. After being on the app for approximately 2 ✌️minutes, I came to the mind blowing 🤯conclusion that Donald Trump is in fact a disgusting person 😳🤡and a disgrace 😧to America🇺🇸 and doesn’t deserve to be in office. 

All I can say from my experience, is I guess I’m a snowflake ❄️ 🤪
attributes.title: I was horrified 😩😔🤢
